name: SpaceShooter (matke)
description:
I did this in my free time and i want to share to other people what i do as a hobby.

I can't say that i am a game developer, but i am developing games in my free time for about 3 years now, and i have experience in programming for about 15 years  from which i do it actively for 5 years .

There will be updates for this game only if there is some interest in this type of games.

(Settings do not work yet)

Because i used free assets for this project i do not want to charge any money for this project but donations are always welcome.

Controls are: left arrow, right arrow and space for shooting.

Please feel free to comment down below.
